<title level="1" right="Action">[Ghost Shot](/Actions.aspx?ID=917) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 110</row>

</column>

---

Make a firearm or crossbow Strike. If you're [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) by the target, the Strike adds the additional precision damage from [One Shot, One Kill](/Actions.aspx?ID=915); if you would already receive that additional damage on the Strike, the effects aren't cumulative. If you were undetected or [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41) by any creatures, you're now hidden from them instead, as the origin of the attack is clear.
name: Ghost Shot
